amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in this bill to pay for outsourcing food stamp call center jobs to foreign countries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section prohibiting the use of funds from being available to pay the federal share of the administrative costs of any state's operation of the food stamp program that are performed outside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
